```{r tab1, cache=cacheon}

tab1all <- print(CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  data = rsdata),
smd = FALSE,
missing = TRUE,
printToggle = FALSE,
nonnormal = tabvars,
catDigits = 1,
contDigits = 1,
noSpaces = TRUE,
explain = FALSE
)
tab1all <- as_tibble(cbind(var = rownames(tab1all), tab1all)) %>%
  select(var, Missing, Overall)


tab1func <- function(stratavar){
tab1 <- print(CreateTableOne(
  vars = tabvars,
  data = rsdata, 
  strata = stratavar),
smd = FALSE,
missing = FALSE,
printToggle = FALSE,
nonnormal = tabvars,
catDigits = 1,
contDigits = 1,
noSpaces = TRUE,
explain = FALSE
)
tab1 <- as_tibble(cbind(var = rownames(tab1), tab1)) %>%
  select(-test)
}

tab1sex <- tab1func(stratavar = "shf_sex")
tab1age <- tab1func(stratavar = "shf_age_cat")
tab1location <- tab1func(stratavar = "shf_location")

tab1 <- Reduce(
  function(...) {
    full_join(...,
      by = "var"
    )
  },
  list(tab1all, tab1location, tab1sex, tab1age)
)


tab1 <- tab1 %>%
  # remove = Yes
  mutate(across(everything(), str_replace_all, fixed(" = Yes"), "")) %>%
  # to get labs and units in place
  mutate(
    var_tmp = str_split(var, " = ", simplify = TRUE)[, 1],
    val_tmp = str_split(var, " = ", simplify = TRUE)[, 2],
    # if recoding or categorizing will still get org label
    var_tmp2 = str_replace_all(var_tmp, "(_cat2|_cat)", ""),
    # if shf/sos combination  will still get org label
    var_tmp2 = str_replace_all(var_tmp2, "shf_sos_com_", "sos_com_")
  )

tab1 <- left_join(tab1,
  meta.variables.Sheet.1 %>%
    select(variable, label, unit),
  by = c("var_tmp2" = "variable")
) %>%
  mutate(
    Variable = coalesce(label, var_tmp),
    Variable = if_else(!is.na(unit),
      paste0(Variable, " (", unit, ")"),
      Variable
    ),
    Variable = if_else(val_tmp != "",
      paste0(Variable, " ", val_tmp),
      Variable
    )
  )

write.xlsx(tab1 %>% select(Variable, Missing:p), paste0("./output/tabs/tab1_", Sys.Date(), ".xlsx"), rowNames = FALSE, overwrite = TRUE)

# footnotes
tab1 <- tab1 %>%
  mutate(
    footnote1 = if_else(str_detect(var_tmp, "^shf_"), footnote_marker_symbol(1), ""),
    footnote2 = if_else(str_detect(var_tmp, "sos_"), footnote_marker_symbol(2), ""),
    footnote3 = if_else(var_tmp %in% impmodvars, footnote_marker_symbol(3), ""),
    footnote4 = if_else(var_tmp %in% modvars, footnote_marker_symbol(4), "")
  ) %>%
  unite(footnote, starts_with("footnote"), sep = "") %>%
  mutate(
    # so no probs
    Variable = sanitize_text(Variable),
    Variable = paste0(Variable, footnote),

    # space in Latex output (fix this other way?)
    Variable = sub("  ", ". ", Variable)
  ) %>%
  select(Variable, Missing:p)

## fix in order to use escape = TRUE
colnams <- colnames(tab1)
colnams <- str_replace(colnams, "Missing", "Missing (%)")
colnams <- str_replace(colnams, "^p", "p-value")
colnams <- str_replace(colnams, ".y|.x", "")
colnames(tab1) <- sanitize_text(colnams)

footnote(
  default_kable(tab1,
    font_size = 4,
    caption = "Baseline characteristics",
    longtable = TRUE,
    escape = FALSE
  ) %>% 
    landscape() %>%
    add_header_above(c(" " = 1, " " = 1, " " = 1, "Location" = 3, "Sex" = 3, "Age" = 3)), 
  general = c(
    "Categorical variables are presented with n (%) and tested with chi-square test and continuous variables with median [q1-q3] and tested with Kruskal-Wallis test."
  ),
  symbol = c(
    "Source: SwedeHF",
    "Source: NPR",
    "Included in imputation model", 
    "Adjusted for in cox regression models" 
  )
)
```
